title: Mario Mutsch - Wikipedia
snippet: Mutsch made his debut for Luxembourg in an October 2005 World Cup qualification match against Russia and by June 2019 he had earned 102 caps, scoring four goals. He has played in 11 FIFA World Cup qualification matches.

title: Mario Mutsch - Manager profile | Transfermarkt
